key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and rising material costs
Weak market conditions and inventory de-stocking impacting revenue growth
Intense competitive pressure from major industry players
Geopolitical risks affecting operations in China and Europe
Short-term financial and operational impacts from restructuring efforts
controversies: Workforce reductions and facility closures leading to potential employee morale and community impact
Significant severance costs associated with restructuring
environmental_issues: Need for continuous improvement in environmental practices to meet regulatory and customer demands
social_issues: Job cuts and facility closures affecting local communities and employee well-being
governance_issues: Adherence to stringent safety and environmental standards to avoid legal or reputational risks
